fields.description:
*Assessment*

In our [current documentation|https://www.eucalyptus.com/docs/eucalyptus/4.0.2/index.html#admin-guide/roles_tasks.html], we make no mention of how a user can assume a role without having to perform the task inside the instance.

We document the following:

* [Launch an Instance with a Role|https://www.eucalyptus.com/docs/eucalyptus/4.0.2/index.html#admin-guide/roles_tasks_create_role_application.html]
* [Use a Role with an Instance Application|https://www.eucalyptus.com/docs/eucalyptus/4.0.2/index.html#admin-guide/roles_tasks_java_sdk.html]

Documentation regarding assuming a role is missing.  Examples of this can be found here:

* [AWS IAM Documentation - Assuming a Role|http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/roles-assume-role.html]
fields.summary: Lack of Documentation Regarding How to Assume a Role
